definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
equanimity in the face of death/to face dangers with assurance

sentences.english: It has been supposed that Darwin renounced evolution on his deathbed.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲達爾文臨死時否定了進化論。

sentences.english: I just want to make a new friend when I'm going todie.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想在臨死之前多交一個朋友而已。

sentences.english: The second woman also recorded her statement before she died.
sentences.chinese: 第二位婦女也在臨死前錄下了證詞。

sentences.english: My grandfather, on his deathbed, sold me this watch.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父，在他臨死的時候，把這塊表賣給了我。

sentences.english: It is said that he died clutching the script to 'The Final Curtain'.
sentences.chinese: 據說，他臨死前緊緊抓着《黑幕風雲》的劇本。

sentences.english: I can perhaps even picture the moment of my death.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能想象自己臨死的那一刻。

sentences.english: In stature she was tall, somewhat slender, and in her latter days, even emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修長，有點嬌弱，臨死前，竟是形銷骨立。

sentences.english: In the end, Molly will gave birth to a son before dying down.
sentences.chinese: 最終，莫莉在臨死之前將兒子生了下來。

sentences.english: We post to the website the near-death experience exactly as it was shared with us.
sentences.chinese: 我們貼在網站的臨死體驗完全是我們得到它時的模樣。

sentences.english: Authorities do YuanQuan before his death is of all kinds of suggest that mean???????
sentences.chinese: 機關算盡的袁荃臨死前的種種暗示意味着什麼？

sentences.english: The die set static also want to know who is linghu chong.
sentences.chinese: 臨死的定靜還想知道令狐沖到底是誰。

sentences.english: Death of that a moment, two brothers got really get out of it.
sentences.chinese: 臨死的那一刻，兄弟二人都得到了真正的擺脫。

sentences.english: Mendoza used a hostage as a human shield to protect himself, before being killed.
sentences.chinese: 門多薩在臨死前還挾持了一名人質來做他的盾牌。

sentences.english: Before dying she made her sisters promise they’d keep her head in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 臨死前，她讓姐姐保證會把她的頭顱留在房子裏。

sentences.english: Liu Hulan glared the enemy before her death.
sentences.chinese: 劉胡蘭臨死前怒目而視着敵人。
